Package org.pepstock.charba.client.configuration

Class AnimationContainer

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.pepstock.charba.client.configuration.AbstractDynamicConfiguration<HasAnimationOptions>
      • org.pepstock.charba.client.configuration.AnimationContainer
  • public final class AnimationContainer
extends AbstractDynamicConfiguration<HasAnimationOptions>
    Manages the ANIMATION, ANIMATIONS and TRANSITIONS options in order to use the same logic among all options/configuration and datasets.
    Author:
    Andrea "Stock" Stocchero
